content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for coming to see the apartment, Mr. Li. Based on the property's size and location, I would like to propose a rental price of 800 Euros per month. This price takes into account the current market rates and the cost of maintaining the property. Is this price agreeable to you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 750 Euros per month. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Bo Li from China

content: I understand, Mr. Li. Thank you for choosing to rent my apartment. I look forward to a successful tenancy relationship with you. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to me.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Thank you Mister Heine. I will contact you if I need anything in the future.

Best regards,
Bo Li
name: Bo Li from China

content: You're welcome, Mr. Li. It was a pleasure meeting you. If you have any questions or concerns in the future, please do not hesitate to contact me. Best of luck with your upcoming move.
name: Heinrich Heine
